description:
Junko lost her husband about ten years ago, and she has been bringing up Ryouichi, her son, alone since then. One day, when he is asleep, she secretly gives him a blowjob and has sex with him.
Two years later, she gets remarried and begin a new life.
Later is revealed that she have feelings for Ryouichi and feels that needs him back
name: Fujisaki Junko
